yespdf.description: Open source Android PDF reader. This app's UI style and interaction logic are inspired by this project.

pdfiumRender.description: High-level Rust bindings for PDFium for PDF rendering

epub.description: Rust library for reading EPUB files and extracting metadata and content.

mobi.description: Rust crate for working with MOBI/AZW3 ebooks and parsing metadata and content.

dndKit.description: Modern, lightweight, and high-performance React drag and drop toolkit

mdEditorRt.description: React Markdown editor with code highlighting and charts support
